foo
----
{
  "type": "Var",
  "name": "foo",
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 3,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 4
    }
  }
}

2
----
{
  "type": "IntLit",
  "val": 2,
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 1,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 2
    }
  }
}

"hello"
----
{
  "type": "StringLit",
  "val": "hello",
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 7,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 8
    }
  }
}

myFunc(2, a, "foo")
----
{
  "type": "FuncCall",
  "func": {
    "type": "FuncCall",
    "func": {
      "type": "FuncCall",
      "func": {
        "type": "Var",
        "name": "myFunc",
        "span": {
          "from": {
            "offset": 0,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 1
          },
          "to": {
            "offset": 6,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 7
          }
        }
      },
      "arg": {
        "type": "IntLit",
        "val": 2,
        "span": {
          "from": {
            "offset": 7,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 8
          },
          "to": {
            "offset": 8,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 9
          }
        }
      },
      "span": {
        "from": {
          "offset": 0,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 1
        },
        "to": {
          "offset": 6,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 7
        }
      }
    },
    "arg": {
      "type": "Var",
      "name": "a",
      "span": {
        "from": {
          "offset": 10,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 11
        },
        "to": {
          "offset": 11,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 12
        }
      }
    },
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 0,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 1
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 6,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 7
      }
    }
  },
  "arg": {
    "type": "StringLit",
    "val": "foo",
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 13,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 14
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 18,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 19
      }
    }
  },
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 19,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 20
    }
  }
}

???
----
{
  "type": "Placeholder",
  "ident": "???",
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 3,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 4
    }
  }
}

let x = 2 in x
----
{
  "type": "Let",
  "name": {
    "ident": "x",
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 4,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 5
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 5,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 6
      }
    }
  },
  "binding": {
    "type": "IntLit",
    "val": 2,
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 8,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 9
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 9,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 10
      }
    }
  },
  "body": {
    "type": "Var",
    "name": "x",
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 13,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 14
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 14,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 15
      }
    }
  },
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 14,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 15
    }
  }
}

map((x: int): int => plus(x, 2), ???)
----
{
  "type": "FuncCall",
  "func": {
    "type": "FuncCall",
    "func": {
      "type": "Var",
      "name": "map",
      "span": {
        "from": {
          "offset": 0,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 1
        },
        "to": {
          "offset": 3,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 4
        }
      }
    },
    "arg": {
      "type": "Lambda",
      "params": [
        {
          "ty": {
            "ident": "int",
            "span": {
              "from": {
                "offset": 8,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 9
              },
              "to": {
                "offset": 11,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 12
              }
            }
          },
          "name": {
            "ident": "x",
            "span": {
              "from": {
                "offset": 5,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 6
              },
              "to": {
                "offset": 6,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 7
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ],
      "body": {
        "type": "FuncCall",
        "func": {
          "type": "FuncCall",
          "func": {
            "type": "Var",
            "name": "plus",
            "span": {
              "from": {
                "offset": 21,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 22
              },
              "to": {
                "offset": 25,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 26
              }
            }
          },
          "arg": {
            "type": "Var",
            "name": "x",
            "span": {
              "from": {
                "offset": 26,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 27
              },
              "to": {
                "offset": 27,
                "line": 1,
                "column": 28
              }
            }
          },
          "span": {
            "from": {
              "offset": 21,
              "line": 1,
              "column": 22
            },
            "to": {
              "offset": 25,
              "line": 1,
              "column": 26
            }
          }
        },
        "arg": {
          "type": "IntLit",
          "val": 2,
          "span": {
            "from": {
              "offset": 29,
              "line": 1,
              "column": 30
            },
            "to": {
              "offset": 30,
              "line": 1,
              "column": 31
            }
          }
        },
        "span": {
          "from": {
            "offset": 21,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 22
          },
          "to": {
            "offset": 31,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 32
          }
        }
      },
      "retType": {
        "ident": "int",
        "span": {
          "from": {
            "offset": 14,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 15
          },
          "to": {
            "offset": 17,
            "line": 1,
            "column": 18
          }
        }
      },
      "span": {
        "from": {
          "offset": 4,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 5
        },
        "to": {
          "offset": 31,
          "line": 1,
          "column": 32
        }
      }
    },
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 0,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 1
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 3,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 4
      }
    }
  },
  "arg": {
    "type": "Placeholder",
    "ident": "???",
    "span": {
      "from": {
        "offset": 33,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 34
      },
      "to": {
        "offset": 36,
        "line": 1,
        "column": 37
      }
    }
  },
  "span": {
    "from": {
      "offset": 0,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 1
    },
    "to": {
      "offset": 37,
      "line": 1,
      "column": 38
    }
  }
}
